H0.text: Pellicle is a structural characteristic present in a paramecium that is not present in an amoeba.

H1.text: Cell wall is a structural characteristic present in a paramecium that is not present in an amoeba.

H2.text: Cytoplasm is the structural characteristic present in a paramecium that is not present in an amoeba.

H3.text: The cytoskeleton is a structural characteristic present in a paramecium that is not present in an amoeba.

A4.text: The body of the cell is enclosed by a stiff but elastic structure called the pellicle.
